description:
The table provides a comprehensive monthly overview of customer engagement within the app, 
capturing data related to accumulated points, usage patterns, and relevant metrics, 
facilitating in-depth analysis of user behavior and app performance.

rm_key.description: The term RMKEY can stand for various things depending on the context, and without specific information, it's challenging to provide a precise description. If you have a specific domain or context in mind, please provide additional details so that I can offer a more accurate description within the token limit.

price_purchase_sku_pointvalue.description: The value of POINT using Payment via X-Store.

amt_point_pay_pyw.description: The number of points caused by payment via Paywise.

n_purchase_sku.description: The number of times caused by payment via X-Store.

date_from_last_point_topup_auto.description: The latest day with Auto Converse Topup

date_from_last_point_topup_onetime.description: The latest day with Manual top

price_purchase_qr_pointvalue.description: The value of POINT using Payment via Scan & Pay.

n_purchase_qr_cs.description: The number of times caused by payment via Scan & Pay type QRCS.

date_from_last_point_transfer_out.description: The latest day that has been transferred to other users

amt_point_topup.description: The number of points caused by all topups

price_purchase_qr_itemprice.description: Total value that uses Payment via Scan & Pay.

days_from_last_purchase_qr.description: The number of days from the latest day that has been paidment via Scan & Pay to the present.

ntx_financial_out.description: The number of financial transactions that have been paid out.

days_from_last_purchase_sku.description: The number of days from the latest date of Payment via X-Store to the present.

amt_point_payment_p_casa.description: The number of points caused by payment by Payment Method is the use of Point, plus payment by transferring money.
